Global COVID-19 surpass 12.3-M mark, death toll at 556,140 with almost 6.6M recoveries tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-746439 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/746439/global-covid-19-surpass-12-3-m-mark-death-toll-at-556-140-with-almost-6-6m-recoveries/story/ At least 12,361,580 cases of coronavirus have been registered in 196 countries and territories, about 556,140 have died while at least 6,593,400 are considered recovered, according to a tally from official sources compiled by AFP on Friday. Turkey president declares Hagia Sophia a mosque after court ruling tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-746434 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/746434/turkey-president-declares-hagia-sophia-a-mosque-after-court-ruling/story/ President Tayyip Erdogan declared Istanbul's Hagia Sophia a mosque on Friday with the first Muslim prayers to begin in two weeks, after a top court ruled the ancient building's conversion to a museum by modern Turkey's founding statesman was illegal.
